name: Multi-Agent AI: Topic Finder + News Writer for Discord

assignments.name: searchSources
assignments.value: Reddit, Twitter, LinkedIn, social media discussions

assignments.name: searchInput
assignments.value: =What are the latest trending discussions about {{$('Content Theme Selector').item.json.selectedTheme}} on {{$('Content Theme Selector').item.json.searchSources}}? Focus on popular posts and conversations from the last 24 hours.

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "llama-3.1-sonar-small-128k-online",
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "system",
      "content": "You are a social media and Reddit content researcher. Find the most interesting and trending content from Reddit, Twitter, LinkedIn and other social platforms. Focus on viral posts, popular discussions, and trending topics. Provide comprehensive information including post content, engagement metrics, source links, and brief summaries for each topic found."
    },
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "{{ $('Dynamic Search Query').item.json.searchInput }}"
    }
  ],
  "temperature": 0.4,
  "top_p": 0.9,
  "return_citations": true,
  "search_domain_filter": [
    "reddit.com",
    "twitter.com",
    "linkedin.com",
    "x.com"
  ],
  "search_recency_filter": "day",
  "return_images": false,
  "return_related_questions": false,
  "max_tokens": 400,
  "stream": false,
  "presence_penalty": 0,
  "frequency_penalty": 0.3
}

={
